Norrathian Trivia Fun


Let's see how much we know about the world most of us live too much in. Links are posted for solutions to the questions, and new trivia sets will be posted weekly. (Hey! No cheating! ;P) Enjoy!

Trivia Set #1: Starting Out Unique (questions and solutions here)

Trivia Set #2: Travel (solutions here)

1) There is one unique zone in the game where time stands still -- it is always 6 pm there, though the date changes regularly. What zone is it?

2) There is one outstanding similiarity among the following dungeon zones; what is it? Runnyeye, the Hole, Crystal Caverns

3) You can directly enter East Freeport from five zones. Which ones are they?

4) What is the only city with a visible source of power?

5) Name at least three inoperable druid rings throughout Norrath (i.e. the ruins are there, but you cannot port into them).

6) The sign on the Erudin docks says the boat will take you to which two places?

7) Name three places on the planet where you can see sphynxes.
